data.text: Ndinovanda mamuri, imi Jehovha;
Ndinunurei uye mundirwire mukururama kwenyu;
Ivai bako rangu rokuvanda kwandingaramba ndichienda;
Haiwa Mwari wangu, ndirwirei, paruoko rwowakaipa,
Nokuti muri tariro yangu, imi Ishe Jehovha,
Ndakazendamira pamuri kubva pakuberekwa kwangu;
Ndava sechishamiso kuvazhinji,
Muromo wangu uzere nerumbidzo yenyu,
Regai kundirasa pandinenge ndakwegura;
Nokuti vavengi vangu vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro pangu;
Vanoti, â€œMwari amusiya;
Regai kuva kure neni, imi Mwari;
Vapomeri vangu ngavaparare vanyadziswe;
Asi kana ndirini, ndichagara ndine tariro;
Muromo wangu uchareva zvokururama kwenyu,
Ndichauya ndichiparidza mabasa enyu makuru, imi Ishe Jehovha;
Kubva pauduku hwangu, imi Mwari, makandidzidzisa,
Kunyange pandinenge ndakwegura uye bvudzi rachena,
Kururama kwenyu kunosvika kudenga kumusoro, imi Mwari,
Kunyange imi makandiratidza matambudziko mazhinji uye anorwadza,
Muchawedzera kukudzwa kwangu,
Ndichakurumbidzai nembira
Miromo yangu ichadanidzira nomufaro
Rurimi rwangu ruchataura nezvamabasa enyu akarurama
